intro: Psychotria titanophylla, commonly known as the giant leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the rainforests of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its large, elliptical leaves that can grow up to 30 centimeters in length. It produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale green. Psychotria titanophylla is often found in shaded, humid environments and plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its native habitat.
